## DialogHelper.open() method

Open the dialog

**Signature:**

```typescript
open(title: string, windowFeatures?: {
        width?: number;
        height?: number;
        left?: number;
        top?: number;
        centerscreen?: boolean;
        resizable?: boolean;
        fitContent?: boolean;
        noDialogMode?: boolean;
        alwaysRaised?: boolean;
    }): this;
```
